response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. It's a game-changer in its field, and I believe it could significantly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I'm confident it's worth more than $10,000. After careful consideration, I propose a price of $15,000 for the product. This price reflects not only its current market value but also the potential long-term benefits it can bring to your operations. I look forward to discussing this opportunity further with you.", "product_price": 15000}
